short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A motivating chrome extension to help you try and put things into perspective and not take setbacks in life too seriously.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This motivating chrome extension publishes a new powerful ‘Life’s too short’ reminder message each time you open up a new tab on your browser. To help you try to put things into perspective and not take setbacks too seriously.

By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’, you are accepting and agreeing to install the desktop extension, and understand that your new tab will be replaced to that provided by the service with Microsoft Bing search results, and the Privacy and Terms of Use of the extension.

Would you like to;
- Not waste time on irrelevant things
- Not get overwhelmed by the everyday stresses that life can sometimes bring
- Value the precious time we all have in this wonderful world
- Focus on what really matters, like Health, Happiness and Family
- Stop worrying
- Slow down
- Surround yourself with positive people
- Stay motivated 

If you answered yes, then add Life’s too Short to Chrome and allow the powerful messages displayed help you reflect on what is really important in life while searching the web.

Privacy Policy: https://freshview.media/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://freshview.media/terms-conditions/
